profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Server

profile_positions.description:
* Responsible for drill performance records by organizing tools and runs information, compiling information as required, and analyzing data in order to present the best alternative to the sales team.
* Support engineering area running hydraulic and jar placement simulations for the drilling bits.
* Developed an interactive visualization of the data on Power BI with direct access to the database, helped the team with an immediate graph improving the search time and presentation of the
report.
* Launch a google earth map with wells completed locations in Colombia, Peru, and Ecuador, from 2000 to 2021; for the teams on the Bits and drilling tools and Drilling Record System to use on well
planning, helped them to visualize the distance between wells and recognize wells similarities by ground and similar arrangements, improved the excel skills as it was needed the use of Excel power tools as power query to filter and organize the necessary data for the job.
